title: compilation failure with CUDA 7.5, CUDNN 4.0
body_html:
I'm trying to compile from source on an AWS instance with Ubuntu 15.04, CUDA 7.5, CUDNN 4.0, and Anaconda Python 3.5 using python setup.py build_deps (which doesn't give any errors) and python setup.py develop which errors out with a series of error: too many arguments like this one:

     CHECK(cudnnSetFilterNdDescriptor(desc, dataType, CUDNN_TENSOR_NCHW, dim, size));
                                                                                  ^
torch/csrc/cudnn/Descriptors.h:46:82: error: too many arguments to function ‘cudnnStatus_t cudnnSetFilterNdDescriptor(cudnnFilterDescriptor_t, cudnnDataType_t, int, const int*)’
In file included from torch/csrc/cudnn/cuDNN.cpp:1:0:
/usr/local/cuda/include/cudnn.h:337:27: note: declared here
 cudnnStatus_t CUDNNWINAPI cudnnSetFilterNdDescriptor(
                           ^
error: command 'gcc' failed with exit status 1```

     CHECK(cudnnSetFilterNdDescriptor(desc, dataType, CUDNN_TENSOR_NCHW, dim, size));
                                                                                  ^
torch/csrc/cudnn/Descriptors.h:46:82: error: too many arguments to function ‘cudnnStatus_t cudnnSetFilterNdDescriptor(cudnnFilterDescriptor_t, cudnnDataType_t, int, const int*)’

                           ^
error: command 'gcc' failed with exit status 1```
body:
I'm trying to compile from source on an AWS instance with Ubuntu 15.04, CUDA 7.5, CUDNN 4.0, and Anaconda Python 3.5 using `python setup.py build_deps` (which doesn't give any errors) and `python setup.py develop` which errors out with a series of `error: too many arguments` like this one:

```
     CHECK(cudnnSetFilterNdDescriptor(desc, dataType, CUDNN_TENSOR_NCHW, dim, size));
                                                                                  ^
torch/csrc/cudnn/Descriptors.h:46:82: error: too many arguments to function ‘cudnnStatus_t cudnnSetFilterNdDescriptor(cudnnFilterDescriptor_t, cudnnDataType_t, int, const int*)’
In file included from torch/csrc/cudnn/cuDNN.cpp:1:0:
/usr/local/cuda/include/cudnn.h:337:27: note: declared here
 cudnnStatus_t CUDNNWINAPI cudnnSetFilterNdDescriptor(
                           ^
error: command 'gcc' failed with exit status 1```
